summary: 2002 CHRYSLER TOWN AND COUNTRY IS SUPPOSED TO BE EQUIPPED WITH THE LATCH SYSTEM IN "ALL REAR SEATING POSITIONS".  THIS SYSTEM (INCLUDING THE TETHERS) ARE NOT PRESENT ON THE 3-PASSENGER SEAT IN THIS VEHICLE.  THE SAME IS TRUE FOR MOST OF THE 2003 TOWN AND COUNTRY VANS IN THE LOT OF MY CAR DEALER.
